> <OLD>
>
> For the moment, BLACKARACHNIA continued with her pulses then, attempting to
> see where the sensor blockages became heavier, and as her active sensors
> were becoming more and more useless, she began to switch over to passive
> ones.  Running her optics to an ultraviolet mode if it was availabile, and
> seeing fi she could begin to run energy blockage traces, to hopefully track
> where teh jamming was heavier.
>
> And as the MAXIMALS and PREDACONS seemed to be readying to travel
> underground, she went over to try and scan the area to see where further
> signatures might be coming from.  Still not breaking her cloak, intent on
> staying aboveground.

<NEW>

Simply put, the closer they got to the cave, the heavier the jamming
got. It was as if it was a foci of some sort, perhaps one of the
places, if not THE place from which the disruptive energies were
coming from.

> <OLD>
>
> DINOBOT sat to the back as the MAXIMALS went to go down teh tunnel.  IF
> there was an ambush ahead, then they would take the brunt of it, and any
> hidden defenses would target and attrite them first.  While also giving the
> PREDACONS effective control of the tunnel up to the surface in case a quick
> escape was needed or other uses could be maintained for it.
>
> Speaking over to TORCA, "I would assume a question of geology.  Their
> facility, if it is such, is probably underground quite simply as that is
> where the most stable ground is.  Aboveground things are too muddy for a
> solid base iwthout using heavy technology to establish it.  Which wold be
> more noticable to outside analysis.  So they have a stable base in the
> caverns.  It also may have to do something with their jamming technology as
> well."
>
> Not saying the obvious 'it was a trap'.

<NEW>

TORCA grunted as if he suspected that something more was at play here
as well, however he continued to followed LEO PRIME into the cave
opening.

The cave itself was quite large, at least once you passed through the
mouth of it. It quickly began to descend its curving path leading
further and further into the darkness that was below. The walls were
like any other cave, rough and natural, thee was no ambient light in
here, except for whatever light spilled in from the mouth of the cave
or what the PREDACONS and MAXIMALS cared to utilize.

Sensors were getting more and more muffled as they passed into it.
Passive ones still abosorbed, but active ones were basically of little
to no use beyond a few feet espeacially ones that used radio or energy
waves that went outside the normal visual or auditory ranges.

Ahead of them they could hear something roar in the distance,
something loud and reptillian - it was TUSCON! From the sound of it,
he was perhaps several hundred meters ahead of them deeper into the
cave.

However behind them, as the last of the PREDACONS were making their
way in, a metallic 'door' slid across the mouth of the cave blocking
out any external light as well as any chance of egress.

The trap, at least this section of it, had been sprung!

OOC: Adam the 'door' will wait for all the preds and maxi's, but it is
up to you if Blackarachnia was inside or outside when the door closed.

(TAG)

- Preston
